data.title: Investment analysis of Universal Music Group NV
data.meta_description: Universal Music Group N.V. (UMG) is a leading music company in the world that engages in sound recording, music publishing, and merchandising. The company owns more than 50 music labels working with artists in all musical genres. The Universal Music portfolio includes rights to music from artists such as The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, Louis Armstrong, Frank Sinatra, U2, Andrea Bocelli, Elton John, KISS, Helen Fisher, as well as Taylor Swift, Drake, King & Prince, Eminem, Morgan Wallen, and The Weeknd. Universal Music seeks artists and works with them, recording and promoting their music in exchange for a share of royalties. As a result, the company owns and manages copyright for musical compositions for any use. Universal Music's merchandising segment produces and sells branded products and also performs some other tasks. Universal Music is registered in the Netherlands and has been traded on the Euronext Amsterdam stock exchange since September 2021.
